landing.bio: I am an opensource contributor and FullStack developer contributed to automizeapp and many other projects. My tech stack includes Python and Javascript. Python for server side and scripting and Javascript for the frontend. I use Django framework for the server side development . I have also worked with NLP .

experience.aboutWork: •	Facilitated cross-functional team of 5 in 3 locations (Germany, Mumbai ,Hyderabad), ranging from entry-level analysts to CEO, and collaborated with Web development, data science, and operations on Consumer Maps, Consumer Analytics, Competitor Analytics•	Conceptualized the areas of Sentimental Analysis, Folium maps,NLTK, Geopy , Flask ,Pandas and Numpy python libraries during development life-cycle.•	Decreased the load time of maps by 50%, automated Topic wise Feature extraction from texts and optimized the word-cloud files generator.

•	Designed a Django application ‘Qeats’ which will fetch the details of nearby restaurants and customer can tag pictures with AI suggestion tags to rate and share the products in Facebook , Pin-interest.Shaped ‘Qbox’  which is a secure file-sharing service. It is a customized version of the popularly available VSFTPD server..Prepared pre-install scripts to run System checks, install And configure QBox.Identified steps to reduce REST API calls in application by 20%

Utilized PHP, Bootstrap, Javascript , MySQL to develop an internal management Discussion Forum. Built a Two-Factor authentication system.Proposed a database schema and integrated in application.Got exposure to Hostinger, xampp server

education.university: Sreenidhi insititute of science and Technology

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

awards.awardDetail: Awarded  for third prize in hackathon for project sentiment-Analysis on feedback.
Received gold medal  and rewafor National level Science congress for designing methods of improving power consumption in our school
